data.text: @TheJeffDodge Adam Lambert Is The Best Thing That Ever Happened On #AmericanIdol #GreatVoice https://t.co/adFRqijBaY

Well, another season is now behind us. Two years ago, we thought we were saying goodbye to #AmericanIdol--and it came back this year to new judges, new contestants, some amazing voices and the usual ups & downs along the way. It's been a fun ride. Here's to season 17! #IdolFinale

Also, one more comment on Caleb and Maddie--they're not the only #Idol couple this season. As Ryan let slip a few weeks ago, Gabby and Cade are also an item. Romance really was in the air on #AmericanIdol this year. Has anything like this ever happened before? #IdolFinale

Even though I was obviously pissed a while ago that Gabby didn't even make the Top 2, that doesn't negate the fact that I'm so happy for Maddie. I was smiling the entire time she sang after winning. Gabby & Maddie were my top favorites this season. Both made the #IdolFinale!

As the winner, Maddie will perform at the Hollywood Bowl this week as well as at the Radio Disney Music Awards. She's also obviously getting a record deal with Hollywood Records. #AmericanIdol #IdolFinale

The winner of #AmericanIdol season 16 is...
MADDIE POPPE!!!

She performs her winner's single "Going Going Gone." The rest of the Top 10 join her on stage and everyone's hugging and trying to sing and crying and being excited. #IdolFinale
Ada Vox and Patti LaBelle perform "Lady Marmalade." This was really fun, if a bit pitchy at times. #AmericanIdol #IdolFinale

Normally the Top 2 receive cars. But since no car company is sponsoring #Idol this year, the Top 2 get vacations to Hawaii! This is even more perfect since the two are a couple. #AmericanIdol #IdolFinale

The Top 2--Caleb & Maddie--are on stage. And Caleb reveals that he and Maddie are boyfriend and girlfriend! Oh my god!!! They're a couple and they BOTH made it to the Top 2? They then perform "Over the Rainbow"--okay, that's freaking adorable! #AmericanIdol #IdolFinale

Yolanda Adams & Michael J. Woodard perform "What the World Needs Now." Words we need to hear--& live by--right now. When it comes to this song & #Idol, I'm reminded of contestants performing this song back in season 2--it was even released as a single. #AmericanIdol #IdolFinale

Katy Perry and Catie Turner perform a stripped-down version of "Part of Me." And this is fantastic! They sound amazing together! This may be the best performance of the night so far! #AmericanIdol #IdolFinale
A video package of Katy Perry moments. #AmericanIdol #IdolFinale

Layla Spring and her little sister Dixie perform "Blue." Partway through, LeAnn Rimes comes out to sing the rest with them. This was a complete surprise--they had no idea this was happening. Layla & Dixie are freaking out! It's adorable! #AmericanIdol #IdolFinale
A video package showing Ada Vox, Noah Davis and some seemingly random contestant eliminated before the Top 24 (who is he? I don't recognize him at all.) perform "Hello." #AmericanIdol #IdolFinale

...Also, taking all that into consideration, I'm also wondering if there's been some Gabby backlash lately, which hurt her in this week's voting. This really sucks--she really does have the most potential out of all of them. A record label needs to sign her! #IdolFinale

I've noticed in online polls on various entertainment news sites lately that Maddie has really been getting a TON of support in recently days/weeks, so I'm wondering if Maddie & Gabby split the vote, allowing Caleb to sneak in and for one of the girls to leave. #IdolFinale

Um...what?!?! I'm kinda pissed. I mean, I'm excited that Maddie's still there, but Gabby gone just like that? No! She was my #1 absolute favorite this entire season--and I was so wanting her to win! This has really put a damper on the night.

#AmericanIdol #IdolFinale

Time for results!

In the Top 2 are...Caleb Lee Hutchinson...and Maddie Poppe!

Which means Gabby Barrett is eliminated in 3rd place.

#AmericanIdol #IdolFinale
Caleb Lee Hutchinson, Gabby Barrett & Maddie Poppe perform "Meant to Be" with Bebe Rexha. #AmericanIdol #IdolFinale
A video package looking back at this season. #AmericanIdol #IdolFinale
We're halfway through the #AmericanIdol season 16 finale! #IdolFinale

Kimmel says that that DVD is the only copy of From Justin to Kelly that ever sold. This whole bit is of course a joke/played for laughs, but I must point out that that can't be the only copy sold because--no joke--I have a copy of From Justin to Kelly. #AmericanIdol #IdolFinale

...From Justin to Kelly DVD, the dawg/dog Randy was always talking about, Sanjaya's hair, Sanjaya himself! (where did his hair go?!?! He looks like a middle-aged guy now)--the crying girl is in the audience! #AmericanIdol #IdolFinale

Jimmy Kimmel comes out to present a "time capsule" of some of the show's most cherished memories. A teeny tiny Simon Cowell T-shirt, Ryan's frosted hair tips from S1, Steven Tyler's scarves & dreamcatchers, the tips of Adam Lambert's fingerless gloves... #AmericanIdol #IdolFinale

Caleb Lee Hutchinson & Darius Rucker perform "Wagon Wheel." When Darius was first introduced, I was like, ugh. And then when I saw what song it was, I burst out laughing because this is like the only song he ever sings. He's such a joke at this point. #AmericanIdol #IdolFinale

Noah Davis, who I believe was eliminated before the Top 24, is presented with an alpaca, since he said during his audition that he wanted one. He even is given an adoption certificate. I'm not sure if this is supposed to be a joke or if it's serious. #AmericanIdol #IdolFinale
Maddie Poppe and Kermit the Frog perform "Rainbow Connection"! #AmericanIdol #IdolFinale

Dennis Lorenzo, Cade Foehner & Gary Clark Jr. perform "Bright Lights." Seeing Cade back on that stage, I'm reminded that a lot of people assumed he would be in the finals, with Gabby. Even though I wasn't the biggest fan of his voice, I thought that would happen. #AmericanIdol
Luke Bryan performs "Sunrise, Sunburn, Sunset." And then Gabby Barrett and Luke perform "Most People are Good." (Followed by a video package of Luke moments.) #AmericanIdol #IdolFinale

Ryan Seacrest teases a dramatic elimination. Does this mean it's going to happen in this first hour? They're not going to drag it out until right before the winner is announced? #AmericanIdol #IdolFinale
Mustard and Nick Jonas perform "Anywhere." Who's Mustard?! Does anyone actually know? Then Jurnee and Nick perform "Jealous." I'm happy to see Jurnee back on that stage. #AmericanIdol #IdolFinale
Caleb Lee Hutchinson does a SPOT-ON impression of Lionel Richie! That is hysterical! I can't stop laughing over here! (Followed by a video package of Lionel moments.) #AmericanIdol #IdolFinale
It looks like they're in the same studio they've been at this season, instead of going to a big arena like they normally do for finales. #AmericanIdol #IdolFinale

The two-hour finale kicks off with Lionel Richie performing "All Night Long." Ooh, that voice is rough. The instruments are really overpowering his voice too. (Oh, look, the Top 10 join him!) #AmericanIdol #IdolFinale

B/c it's not live coast-to-coast like the last 3 weeks have been, I'll be staying away from my Twitter feed, my notifications and trending topics so I don't accidentally spoil myself. I know, I'm already on Twitter, so it's risky business, but I'm only sticking with this thread.
